title: MachineRegistry Audit
verdict: PASS - MachineRegistry has rich 40-field Machine interface, 4-tier source catalog (60 files, 24,643 lines), and proper data hierarchy

registry_overview.loading_pattern: 4-tier source catalog: CORE (8 files, 4,087 lines), ENHANCED, LEVEL5, ENGINE (4 files, 1,294 lines)

key_sub_interfaces.SpindleSpecs: max_rpm, power_continuous/30min/peak, torque, bearing_type, spindle_nose, coolant_through
key_sub_interfaces.AxisSpecs: name, travel, rapid_rate, max_feed, acceleration, resolution, repeatability, accuracy
key_sub_interfaces.ToolChangerSpecs: type (7 variants), capacity, max dims, change_time
key_sub_interfaces.ControllerSpecs: manufacturer, model, cnc_type, max_block_rate, look_ahead, memory, connectivity

type_distribution.controller_families: FANUC, SIEMENS, HEIDENHAIN, MAZAK, OKUMA, HAAS, etc.
